name: cursor-helper
description: Get notified when Cursor tasks complete with customizable notifications and sounds. Includes context window monitoring and file edit confirmation alerts.

cursorHelper.flagFile.description: Path to the flag file to watch for task completion

cursorHelper.playSound.description: Play a sound when a task completes

cursorHelper.customSoundPath.description: Path to custom sound file (leave empty for system default)

cursorHelper.debounceMs.description: Debounce time in milliseconds for file change events

cursorHelper.enableLogging.description: Enable detailed logging to output channel

cursorHelper.contextMonitoring.flagFile.description: Path to the context alert flag file

cursorHelper.contextMonitoring.message.description: Message to display when context window is at capacity

cursorHelper.contextMonitoring.threshold.description: Alert when context usage exceeds this percentage (0-100)

cursorHelper.fileConfirmation.enabled.description: Enable alerts when Cursor requests file edit confirmation

cursorHelper.fileConfirmation.flagFile.description: Path to the file confirmation alert flag file

cursorHelper.fileConfirmation.message.default: üìù Cursor is requesting file edit permission
cursorHelper.fileConfirmation.message.description: Message to display when Cursor requests file edit confirmation
